<h3 id="X10200">X(10200)&nbsp;=&nbsp;PERSPECTOR OF THESE TRIANGLES: ABC AND 2ND-CENTROIDAL TRIANGLE OF THE OUTER-YFF TRIANGLE</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4-2*(b-c)^2*a^2+2*b*c*(b+c)*a+(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :  <p><b>
X(10200) = R*X(1)+3*(R-r)*X(2)
</b></p>
<p>X(10200) lies on these lines:{1,2}, {3,3816}, {4,3825}, {5,6256}, {11,474}, {35,6921}, {36,2478}, {40,6967}, {56,4187}, {104,6975}, {119,1656}, {140,1001}, {142,3358}, {214,3486}, {377,7741}, {388,3814}, {404,1479}, {405,1470}, {406,1877}, {452,5267}, {496,1376}, {515,6944}, {516,6926}, {631,2077}, {908,3338}, {946,3359}, {993,5084}, {999,1329}, {1058,8715}, {1385,6959}, {1478,4193}, {1519,5437}, {1699,6890}, {1788,3878}, {2551,8666}, {3035,3295}, {3090,3822}, {3337,5905}, {3436,5563}, {3485,5883}, {3526,6690}, {3560,6713}, {3576,6834}, {3583,4190}, {3585,5187}, {3656,10107}, {3754,5603}, {3812,5886}, {3813,9709}, {3817,6847}, {3833,6952}, {3848,6861}, {3884,5657}, {3916,4679}, {4188,4302}, {4293,6919}, {4297,6848}, {4299,5046}, {4317,5080}, {4423,7483}, {5070,6668}, {5259,6910}, {5277,9599}, {5436,6889}, {5450,6893}, {5587,6983}, {5691,6953}, {5731,6979}, {5818,6702}, {5880,9955}, {6675,8167}, {6796,6970}, {6825,10165}, {6837,7988}, {6846,10171}, {6872,7280}, {6931,7951}</p>
<p>
X(10200) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,1698,6735), (2,1125,10198), (2,3086,10), (2,3616,498), (10,10199,3086), (1698,4853,10), (3616,5554,1), (3816,6691,3), (4193,5253,1478), (5084,7288,993), (5248,6681,631)<br>
